hero_description: Software developer with experience in developing web and mobile applications, focused on writing clean and efficient code with a focus on maintainability and performance.
skills_subtitle: A complete toolset to build robust backend systems and advanced solutions.
skills_backend_desc: Java 17+ with Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, Spring Web, Spring Data JPA, Hibernate, Spring Security with JWT and BCrypt.
skills_frontend_desc: JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Next.js for reactive and componentized UIs, styled with Tailwind CSS.
skills_architecture_desc: Domain-Driven Design (DDD), Hexagonal Architecture, SOLID, Unit Tests (JUnit, Mockito), and Integration Tests (RestAssured).
skills_database_desc: Relational databases like PostgreSQL, including data modeling and inheritance strategies.
skills_devops_desc: Environment management with Docker and Docker Compose, facilitating the creation of CI/CD pipelines.
skills_others_desc: Additional experience with Node.js, PHP with Laravel, React Native, and Vue.js for diverse solutions.
exp_1_desc:
• Delivered on-demand projects as a full-stack developer, using Java with Spring Boot for the backend and React.js for the frontend.
• Worked directly with clients, which broadened my product vision and focus on practical, functional solutions.
exp_2_desc:
• Developed web and mobile applications with React.js, React Native, Vue.js, and TypeScript.
• Collaborated in agile teams, contributing to continuous and well-documented deliveries, using best practices with Git and REST API integration.
exp_3_desc:
• Participated in real projects focusing on software engineering and agile methodologies.
• Contributed features to web projects, gaining practical experience in Java, Node.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
edu_1_desc: • Participation in the GoTour project, winner of the Centelha program.
edu_2_title: Technician in Computer Maintenance and Support
edu_2_desc: • Technical training integrated with high school.
projects_subtitle: A selection of some of my most impactful work.
proj_1_desc: A tourism application developed as part of an academic project that stood out and was awarded in the Centelha program.
proj_1_tech: Java, Spring Boot, React, TypeScript, PostgreSQL
proj_2_desc: Describe one of your main projects here. Talk about the problem it solves, its features, and the impact it had.
proj_3_desc: Use this space to highlight another important application from your portfolio, detailing technical challenges and implemented solutions.
contact_subtitle: Interested in working together? Let's discuss your project.
